title: One-To-One Function
text: A one-to-one function is a function in which each output value corresponds to exactly one input value. There are no repeated $$x-$$ or $$y-$$ values.
speech: A one-to-one function is a function in which each output value corresponds to exactly one input value. There are no repeated , x minus  or  y minus  values.
